                      DotStateException,

             throws DotDataException,
                    DotStateException,

        Parameters:

      • removeLive

        void removeLive(java.lang.String identifier)
                throws DotDataException,
                       DotStateException,
                       DotSecurityException
        Remove the reference to the live version for this identifier. This is useful to unpublish an asset.
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the asset to be left without live version
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotStateException
        DotSecurityException

      • removeLive

        void removeLive(java.lang.String identifier,
              long lang)
                throws DotDataException,
                       DotStateException,
                       DotSecurityException
        Remove the reference to the live version for this identifier. This is useful to unpublish an asset. This is the contentlet specific method as we need the language_id for those cases
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the asset to be left without live version
        lang - language id of the contentlet
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotStateException
        DotSecurityException

      • saveVersionInfo

        void saveVersionInfo(VersionInfo vInfo)
                     throws DotDataException,
                            DotStateException
        Will save the VersionInfo Record. For normal operations you should use the setLive, setWorking etc... but there are cases like PushPublishing where you want to say the entire record.
        Parameters:
        cvInfo -
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotStateException

        Parameters:

        DotStateException
